com.upsight.android.analytics.internal.action

Class Actionable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.analytics.internal.action.Actionable

  • public abstract class Actionable
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that executes Upsight actions.

      • Actionable

        protected Actionable(java.lang.String id,
          ActionMap<T,U> actionMap)

        Type Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Gets the ID.
        Returns:
        The ID.

      • executeActions

        public void executeActions(java.lang.String trigger)
        Sequentially executes a list of actions associated with this Actionable.
        Parameters:
        trigger - The trigger to execute a list of actions in the action map.

      • signalActionCompleted

        public void signalActionCompleted(Bus bus)
        Signals that an action has completed execution. Every action must call this exactly once. What constitutes completion of an action is up to the specific action implementation. It may signal at the end of the synchronous part of the action execution block, or wait until asynchronous tasks have completed.
        Parameters:
        bus - The Bus to emit an Actionable.ActionMapFinishedEvent if this signal finishes the action map.

      • signalActionMapCompleted

        public void signalActionMapCompleted(Bus bus)
        Signals that an action map has completed execution. Every action map must call this exactly once, usually when the destroy action is called.
        Parameters:
        bus - The Bus to emit an Actionable.ActionMapFinishedEvent if this signal finishes the action map.
